Text: i can't thank you enough for this upload. . .this is one of the most amazing movies i"ve ever seen.

This is one of my favorite films as well so no need to thank me. I wanna thank those who download and appreciate a good movie not to mention its book. Its based off a novel "White Oleander" by Janet Fitch, read it if u havnt! As always the book is better than the movie.
